title: quinn top is absolutely the most cancer thing i have ever played against.
body:
can someone give me some counters if she even has any...her kit seems to make her counter every top laner.
knowing shes mostly played top, why does riot let her be this toxic to play against?

replies.body: Have you not played against Vayne top?  It's like Quinn but with fewer 1v1 weaknesses.
both are toxic as hell but quinns worse with her bs blind and her jump back bullshitt that seems to have a low cd

I reliably win lane against her as Garen.  She's annoying but she has very clear openings to fight back.  I don't know what your champion pool looks like, but Quinn is very easy to deal with once you learn how.

Vayne doesn't have windows of opportunity like that, either you play ranged against her, play an assassin, or you lose lane without a jungle camp.
I'd suggest you Nasus, max E, build ring + 2 pots into ring (or dark seal) + corruption. Make sure to take a second point in your E lvl 3. You'll be able to bully her out of lane past lvl 3

Armor. {{item:1054}} . {{item:3076}} . And more Armor.

Seriously, Quinn top is a pick that intends to dominate the lane to be useful. Deny her that domination, and her team will have a lot more difficult of a time winning (assuming standard solo queue behaviour here, where no jungler dreams of ever touching a tanky frontliner, even if his top laner picked Quinn first).
Hahaha should of seen when she was picked in every match when the lethality items were buffed earlier in the year lol
